title: Do we need more bans?
body: Hello i was in champ select today and i was wondering who should i ban but when you think about it there are so many crazy champions currently running around the rift holding/keeping so much map pressure that you're stuck to who is most broken/op like cool yeah alright ban {{champion:157}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:164}} but like what about {{champion:67}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:13}} oh and dont get me started on {{champion:92}}. I believe having one extra ban on the board could change the game completely it would really hurt one tricks and if you think about it league are always releasing new champions so will there ever be extra bans?

replies.body: Its everywhere on riot. Its on that big page of things they keep talking about
I'm pretty sure each team is getting 5 bans soon.
Oh really did you read this somewhere? if so could you provide a link =D
